Description: Please Read Entire Description Below and See All Pictures Before purchasing because this is a final sale item. Dita Mach Two Made in Japan Sunglasses. $750 Retail. Model # DRX-2031B-60 ( Black and Gold). Brown Gradient Lenses with Purple Anti-reflective coating. Size: 60 - 17 - 127. Lenses will show light surface scratches. Moderate wear to case. Includes only what is pictured. Pictures are of actual item taken right before the start of the auction.
